note: This behavior works with the minecraft:sittable component. When the entity is commanded to sit, this goal prevents other behaviors from moving the entity.

generated_doNotEdit.title: Stay While Sitting Behavior
generated_doNotEdit.description: Allows the mob to stay put while it is in a sitting state instead of doing something else.

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: As priority approaches 0, the priority is increased. The higher the priority, the sooner this behavior will be executed as a goal.
